remarks: Value of meet for a poset with LUB expanded.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 11-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
meetval2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetval2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
meetval2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
meetval2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
meetval2 $p |- ( ph -> ( X ./\ Y ) = ( iota_ x e. B ( ( x .<_ X /\ x .<_ Y ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( z .<_ X /\ z .<_ Y ) -> z .<_ x ) ) ) ) $.
$d ./\ x z $.
$d B x z $.
$d K x z $.
$d X x z $.
$d Y x z $.
